text: Llandaff North Rugby Football Club are a Welsh rugby union club based in Llandaff North, Cardiff in South Wales. The club is a member of the Welsh Rugby Union and is a feeder club for the Cardiff Blues. They presently play in the WRU Division Three South East, having moved from Division Four South East in the 2007/08 season after winning first place in the league. ==Club honours== * WRU Division Four South East 2007/08 - Champions ==References== ==External links== *Llandaff North RFC Official Site *Wales Rugby Clubs - Llandaff North RFC Category:Welsh rugby union teams Category:Sport in Cardiff Category:Llandaff
title: Llandaff North RFC
